parts.text:
SLURM
{
"application": "SLURM",
"details": {
"partition": "gpu",
"job_name": "mclap",
"nodes": 1,
"ntasks_per_node": 8,
"cpus_per_gpu": 6,
"gres": "gpu:8",
"exclude": "gpu-st-p4d-24xlarge-[23,30,31,108,115,134,135,183,185,186,187,188,275,277,374]",
"modules": "intelmpi",
"environment_variables": [
"LD_LIBRARY_PATH",
"NCCL_PROTO",
"PATH",
"LD_PRELOAD",
"FI_EFA_FORK_SAFE",
"FI_LOG_LEVEL",
"FI_EFA_USE_DEVICE_RDMA",
"NCCL_ALGO",
"NCCL_DEBUG",
"NCCL_DEBUG_SUBSYS",
"PYTHONFAULTHANDLER",
"CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING",
"OMPI_MCA_mtl_base_verbose",
"FI_EFA_ENABLE_SHM_TRANSFER",
"FI_PROVIDER",
"FI_EFA_TX_MIN_CREDITS",
"NCCL_TREE_THRESHOLD",
"NCCL_P2P_DISABLE",
"NCCL_IBEXT_DISABLE",
"NCCL_SOCKET_IFNAME",
"HOSTNAMES",
"MASTER_ADDR",
"MASTER_PORT",
"COUNT_NODE",
"TRANSFORMERS_CACHE",
"CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES"
],
"commands": [
"source /opt/intel/mpi/latest/env/vars.sh",
"source /fsx/yusong/clap/bin/activate",
"cd /fsx/yusong/CLAP/src",
"srun --comment clap --cpu_bind=v --accel-bind=gn python -m training.main \\",
"    --save-frequency 5 \\",
"    --save-top-performance 3 \\",
"    --save-most-recent \\",
"    --dataset-type=\"webdataset\" \\",
"    --precision=\"fp32\" \\",
"    --batch-size=96 \\",
"    --lr=1e-4 \\",
"    --wd=0.0 \\",
"    --epochs=45 \\",
"    --workers=6 \\",
"    --use-bn-sync \\",
"    --amodel HTSAT-tiny \\",
"    --tmodel roberta \\",
"    --warmup 3200 \\",
"    --report-to \"wandb\" \\",
"    --wandb-notes \"10.16-clap-dataset-1#-htsat-roberta\" \\",
"    --datasetnames \"Clotho\" \"audiocaps\" \\",
"    --datasetinfos \"train\" \"unbalanced_train\" \\",
"    --top-k-checkpoint-select-dataset=\"Clotho-test\" \\",
"    --top-k-checkpoint-select-metric=\"mAP@10\" \\",
"    --openai-model-cache-dir /fsx/yusong/transformers_cache \\",
"    --logs /fsx/clap_logs \\",
"    --seed 3407 \\",
"    --remotedata \\",
"    --gather-with-grad \\",
"    --optimizer \"adam\" \\",
"    --data-filling \"repeatpad\" \\",
"    --data-truncating \"rand_trunc\" \\",
"    --pretrained-audio /fsx/yusong/audio_pretrained_model/HTSAT-fullset-imagenet-map=0.467.ckpt"
]
}
}
